item.title: My favorite YouTube Channels 2020
item.description: In 2018, I did a list of my favourite YouTube Channels (Spanish), almost 2 years pass after this post and on this time I start to watch new channels and remove or watch less other channels. This year I classified the videos by topic (as I did last year), and I added an emoji code: ‚≠ê Favorite channel. I usually watch most videos. ‚ùó Very interesting üî• Some videos are very interesting
